itunes:subtitle: Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they talk about the hope and help kids need most right now as we get full-on into the school year. Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes . Connect with Sissy, David, and...
itunes:summary:
Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they talk about the hope and help kids need most right now as we get full-on into the school year.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes HERE.

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com

Connect with Minno at podcast.gominno.com
